meanings.sent1: I misfeed the printer by putting too many papers at once.
meanings.sent2: The machine misfeeds when the paper is not aligned properly.
meanings.sent3: Oops, I misfeed the hungry dog by giving it the wrong food!
meanings.sent4: Her instructions misfeed my understanding, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent5: The chef misfeeds the recipe, resulting in a disastrous dish.

meanings.definition: A failure or error in feeding, especially in a machine.
meanings.sent1: The misfeed caused a paper jam in the copier.
meanings.sent2: The technician fixed the misfeed in the printer quickly.
meanings.sent3: The misfeed in the vending machine made the snacks get stuck.
meanings.sent4: The misfeed in the conveyor belt halted the production line.
meanings.sent5: The misfeed of cards disrupted the smooth operation of the game.
